thread.title: Jennifer Lopez Comes Dangerously Close To Nip Slip During Vegas Rehearsal [VIDEO]
thread.title_full: Jennifer Lopez Comes Dangerously Close To Nip Slip During Vegas Rehearsal [VIDEO]

author: Katie Jerkovich
title: Jennifer Lopez Comes Dangerously Close To Nip Slip During Vegas Rehearsal [VIDEO]
text:
TOP 5470122 
Jennifer Lopez came dangerously close to a major wardrobe malfunction during a rehearsal for her upcoming Vegas show. 
On Tuesday, the 47-year-old actress and singer shared the scandalous video on Instagram, with her 58.1 million followers, that showed her rocking out in a very low-cut top that showed off her cleavage. (RELATED: Jennifer Lopez Showed Off Her Amazing Body In Birthday ‘Suit’) Jennifer Lopez. (Photo: Getty Images) A video posted by Jennifer Lopez (@jlo) on Feb 7, 2017 at 5:34pm PST 
The mother of two also shared her thoughts about her upcoming show in another post on the social media site, saying on the video she wasn’t quite ready for the show. 
“creeping up on me too quick lol! #dontworry #letsgetit #jlovegas #immabeast,” Lopez captioned the post next to the video. A video posted by Jennifer Lopez (@jlo) on Feb 6, 2017 at 1:58pm PST 
Recently, the actress launched her shoe line with Giuseppe Zanotti at Neiman Marcus in Beverly Hills, California. At the event, she was captured on the red carpet in a white suit with no bra. The whole outfit was very revealing. (photo by: AXELLE WOUSSEN/Bauergriffin.com)
